评论详情: It keeps you very warm and looks very elegant & sophisticated.  I can't recommend this coat enough.
Perfect fit! Great quality! Responsive customer service. There was an error in transit and they responded and fixed the problem the same day.

This cashmere blend men's overcoat arrived in a long narrow box with what looked like a hanger sticking out.  I knew immediately it was the surprise I ordered for my granddaughter's sweetheart.  I chose the navy 56L knowing he wore a 54/56L suit jacket.  When I opened the box, the coat was nearly perfect; I saw almost no wrinkles, and the fabric was incredibly soft ...just like real 100% cashmere!!  The lining is elegant, and I knew it was the coat for him.  He's a practicing lawyer still studying for the bar, and I knew the gift was made for him!!  He took it home to try it on with his suit, and he texted me a picture saying, "Gram, it's perfect!!"  What can I say to the manufacturer but, "Thank you, thank you, thank you!"

We bought this dress coat for our son based upon reviews.  Coat was nice and warm, fit great and looked classy…except the buttons barely being attached!  They started falling off not long after getting it out of the box.  Too much pain to return it so we chose to pay another $20 to have a tailor put them back on.

This coat is exactky as told in the description.  it is so soft yet durable and very handsome.  it is exactly what we wanted.  the color is beautiful and the construction is very very good.  better than had been expected.  smooth sleek lines and delivery was fantastic...it arrived today, the13th and delivery date was to be the 18th=the 24th  I am more than impressed with this coat over all and with the seller also.
The fit is very good. The colour and texture are great. Well designed, well crafted. Exactly what I was looking for. Fast shipping. Excellent smooth transaction.

I was looking forward to getting this coat. And it came today. So I unpacked it and put it on. I know clothes you order online run different but this is ridiculous. I’m 6/2 and a half so reading the reviews I figured I needed a long size. But this coat goes right above my ankles. The sleeves are also very long. I take a 34-35 shirt sleeve. And there about an inch to long. Other than that I like the coat. So I’m going to try and return it. And maybe order a smaller size. I hope this was helpful.

Bought for my husband. Ultimately, it wasn’t his style and he returned it. He is over six foot tall and the coat hung just a little past his knees. It fit well in the chest, waist and arms. Sadly, he prefers shorter coats, otherwise he would have kept it.

Christmas gift for our Son-in-law. He’ll love it!!
Looks good. Fits well. One of the juicer overcoats I have.

For the price, it feels excellent. I only got it today, so I haven't even actually worn it outside, but it fits and feels good (that 10% cashmere makes a difference). My only real complaint is that the sleeves are too long. But, I expected that. I am 182 cm (6'), 114 kg (250 lbs) with a 132 cm (52+ in) chest. Often, my shoulders are very uncomfortable in XXL (2XL), so I order XXXL (3XL) so my shoulders can move without binding and I can inhale without my clothes restricting me. That's very dependent on who makes the clothing item, of course. In this case, I ordered the 56R. I am very glad I did, because the 54R would not be comfortable on my shoulders (especially after I put on a shirt and tie, or some other clothing). I do NOT understand why manufacturers think a big chested guy must have super elongated arms, so the sleeves are about 5 cm (2 in) too long (hit me at my knuckles, looks silly). To look good I will have to pay to have the sleeves taken in (maybe have to move some of the sleeve buttons?). The full length hits me mid shin, which is perfect. The quilt lining seems fine. Again, I haven't actually worn it outside with proper clothing on underneath, so I reserve the right to modify this review later, ha ha. But, first impressions overall very good, very nice looking, especially for the price.

This is evidently from a production run that was based on the wrong template or pattern, and there are some factory defects to boot.  It is very, very long. The side pockets are set quite low. The buttons extend almost to the bottom hem, making it impossible to shorten significantly. Size 42R was apparently based on a 6'4" height.  The fabric has a long scratch on each lapel, which I couldn't smooth out or disguise.  Unfortunately, the coat was sent to an overseas address, so it can't be returned without spending more than the coat is worth.

After trying a lot of similar coats at the $750 and up price point, I was so excited at the quality of this coat.  It's a little lighter in weight than I expected but is still amazing for it's intended use.

Was a bit longer than I thought and sleeves needed hemmed up.  If not for that it would be 5 stars plus.  Great coat.  Give me some time using and I’ll probably re rate at 5 stars.  Don’t let my rating deter ur purchase
Looks and feels better than expected.  I get lots of complements every time I wear it.

Overall I really like the coat.  It's way too long though. I'm 6' and weigh 270. I ordered the 54 and it fits fine across the shoulders,  around my chest and stomach as well as the arm length. It comes down to my mid calves or longer. I need at least a foot taken off the length.  I can't wait to get it altered and be able to wear it when needed.

评论概述: Best seller on Amazon I've experienced so far!
评论详情: Great seller, was extremely accommodating and considerate. You want a quality overcoat that looks way more expensive than you paid? These are the guys to hook you up! Above and beyond service. I can usually buy a suit 50 long off the rack with tailoring of pants. I initially ordered the 52 long and it fit like it was tailor made. The problem for me was I only had a T shirt on under it. I spoke with John explained the situation he suggested the 54 Long and he was on the money! I was concerned about sleeve length, but with the blazer or suit jacket underneath, fits like it was tailor made. These guy's know their business, if you're in the market looking for a specific item. Even if it's not in stock, they'll get it for you.
Coat fits well, however, the length is to my ankles. Missed return window, so now I’m stuck with it and guess I’ll have to pay for alterations.

This is a great overcoat. It has a modern cut and fit and is light weight but warm. Its combination of wool and cashmere give it a classic look with a modern cut.

评论概述: Nicely made coat, hangs well off your shoulders
评论详情: 46L Black Very excited to get my new overcoat today. It was double bagged and came with a hanger. Stitching is very solid and material is of medium weight. It was very wrinkly so I hung it on the shower rail and steamed it a few minutes and let it dry, and it was much better. I tried it on, with and without a jacket and it was fine, arm length a little short but very little with a jacket under it. The length fell blow my knee, waist and chest were perfect. I am 6' 2" 220 and it is very hard to get a good fit. The lapel seemed to have two hang lines and that is when I noticed that it had tiny glitter on the collar, shoulders and lapels. The chest pocket had an annoying wrinkle and when I stood in a mirror I could see why. Part of the tacking had been cut and when I put my hand in the pocket I could see it was from stress of weight in the lower pocket that pilled directly from that point. What I got was a return, someone had worn it and returned it. The middle back was slightly lighter in color and had the beginnings of little pills all over it and has a little shine to it. I was disappointed that I got a used coat but an hour of brushing and pulling out grey hairs with a tweezer and it looked much better. My wife and daughter say it makes me look slimmer and love the look. For the price and look, well worth it considering I may only wear it a dozen times a year.

Very nice material and craftsmanship.  I ordered it a size too big, thinking I'd have it covering a suit in many cases.  i'll likely have it altered in the sleeve length and chest/ shoulders, if possible.
I love everything about this coat
Fits well, looks good.  Dislike collar reverse side fabric.
Very nice overcoat. Not for daily use. It’s fine wool, special occasions only but it looks fits and feels great. Not a coat you go for a walk in the rain in...

It fit well off the rack. I ordered it long and two sizes bigger then my suit jackets in the chest so it would fit well over a suit. I does. I’m a big man 6’4” with a 56” chest.  I ordered a 58 long. I got a lot of fabric for the money. I just wore it at a funeral on Cape Cod, windy with temps in the low 20s and it kept me very warm

We live in the south so when my husband planned a trip for NYC in January, I knew he needed a warm coat to wear over his suit.  This one was perfect!  My husband is a big guy, I got the size he wears in a suit and it fit over his suit just fine.  He also said it was warm!
